titles: Tuesday the seven and twentieth of April, 1652. Votes of Parliament for setting the poor on vvork, and for preventing of common-begging.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament of England,
notes: Order to print dated: Friday the Thirtieth of April, 1652. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
With Parliamentary seal at head of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Poor laws --  England --  Early works to 1800.
